data.title: Custom Design & OEM for IVD Instrument and Medical Device
data.meta_description: PreciGenome offers OEM solution In Vitro Diagnostic (IVD) Instrument for prototyping and instrumentation. To help you focus on your applications and your end customers, we have developed a wide range of IVD OEM products. Expertise: liquid handling, micro/meso fluidic system, heating/cooling control.
data.text:
We offer thorough review of your existing concept to establish its feasibility and identify key modifications required to achieve a commercially viable, manufacturable product. We assess the requirements of the product based on our experience and capabilities. Together, we define the project and draw up an initial project plan.

​

Design requirements

Risks assessment

Product breakdown

Initial project plan

In this phase, we address technical risks using a rapid sprint based methodology where key risks are isolated and addressed with rapid design and build test work packages. We focus on feasibility and make an inventory of all the requirements and specifications for this project. Usually, we build proof-of-principle prototypes for laboratory testing

​

Functional breakdown

Proof of concept

Cost estimation

Risk analysis and management

Time line management

Validation and verification testing to ensure that the detailed design specifications satisfy the design requirements. A serial of prototypes will be designed and built. We test and enhance until it meets the specifications and has all the required features. This process results in a verification report for the validated and locked-down product design which will now be ready for production.

​

We think ahead about scalable manufacturing processes to keep options open for future volumes. We start the build-up of our manufacturing process.

​

Product design

Prototyping and validation

Iterations

Product verification

Design, build, installation and wet commissioning of all pilot line infrastructure as per the manufacturing plan generated in earlier stages. Following the processes that ensure the quality of your product, we make sure we will produce the agreed-upon volumes and the products meet all the requirements.

​

Quality Control

Quality Assurance

Production
